
<script type="module" src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/model-viewer/3.4.0/model-viewer.min.js"></script>

<style>
  #container { width: 100%; display: flex; justify-content: center; }
  model-viewer { width: 800px; height: 600px; }

<p> This image from the open3D docs is mapped onto a torus. </p>
<img src="../assets/uv_checkerboard.png" alt="UV Checkerboard Texture" style="width: 300px; margin-bottom: 20px;">


<div id="container">
<model-viewer 
        style="width: 100%; height: 400px; background-color: #eee;"
        src="../assets/uv_checkerboard_res_1024_iter_0_period_3_map.glb" 
        alt="A 3D textured torus" 
        auto-rotate 
        camera-controls 
        ar 
        shadow-intensity="1" 
        exposure="1" 
        environment-image="neutral">
</model-viewer>
</div>

A periodic map applied to the image above gives this.
